qas.question: What is another possible weapon for anti-aircraft use?
When did personnel first start thinking about using lasers in combat?
What laser can currently be used in the type of role that was first thought of in the late 1960s?
The use of lasers in anti-aircraft warfare is currently considered what?
When do some people believe that lasers can play a more prominent role in air defence?

context: Another potential weapon system for anti-aircraft use is <a0_0>the laser<a0_0/>. Although air planners have imagined lasers in combat since <a1_0>the late 1960s<a1_0/>, only the most modern laser systems are currently reaching what could be considered "<a3_0>experimental usefulness<a3_0/>". In particular the <a2_0>Tactical High Energy Laser<a2_0/> can be used in the anti-aircraft and anti-missile role. If current developments continue, some[who?] believe it is reasonable to suggest that lasers will play a major role in air defence starting <a4_0>in the next ten years<a4_0/>.
